item.title: Forget about AI costs: Google just changed the game with open-source Gemini CLI that will be free for most developers
item.description: Google is bringing Gemini Pro 2.5 to the command line with a powerful new open source tool — and it's doing it mostly for free.

item.title: Stanford’s ChatEHR allows clinicians to query patient medical records using natural language, without compromising patient data
item.description: ChatEHR accelerates chart reviews for ER admissions, streamlines patient transfer summaries and synthesizes complex medical histories.

item.title: What’s inside Genspark? A new vibe working approach that ditches rigid workflows for autonomous agents
item.description: Genspark's autonomous AI agents prove that less control beats rigid workflows, forcing enterprise AI leaders to rethink how they architect intelligent...

item.title: Windsurf CEO Varun Mohan throws cold water on 1-person, billion-dollar startup idea at VB Transform: ‘more people allow you to grow faster’
item.description: Internally, Windsurf organizes into lean squads of three or four engineers, each focused on testing a narrow set of product hypotheses.

item.title: ‘Sandbox first’: Andrew Ng’s blueprint for accelerating enterprise AI innovation
item.description: Speaking at VB Transform, Andrew Ng said observability and guardrails are important, but not at the cost of speed.
